resources.string: To send payments, you\'ll need to install and use Google Chrome as your default browser.
Ready to send invoices, track your customers and manage your payments on the go\?
Withdraw funds to your bank account, issue refunds and send payments to almost anyone, in just a few clicks.
See your photo, payment preferences and more before you log in. (Not recommended if you share your device.)
Touch ID and PIN will be disabled
Turning off Remember Me will also unlink your Touch ID and disable your PIN.
